T02TD3468E:120b-1: ba shya dhi k'a ra manydzu shr'i s'a dha nam /
T02TD3468E:120b-3: lhag par dbang du byed pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs /
T02TD3468E:120b-5: dpal ldan 'jam dpal rdo rje'i skur bsgrubs te //
T02TD3468E:120b-6: sku mdog dmar po 'od zer 'bar ba'i tshogs //
T02TD3468E:120b-7: dbyangs yig bcu drug yang dag 'khor ba yi //
T02TD3468E:120b-8: snying ga'i pad dbus rdo rje bsam par bya //
T02TD3468E:120b-9: bandhu'i me tog rnam pa dang mtshungs skur //
T02TD3468E:120b-10: dmigs nas nges par rkang drug bshad pa yis //
T02TD3468E:120b-11: dbugs ni rlung gis ma lus dal bu yis //
T02TD3468E:120b-12: nges par drangs nas skye ba'i bsam pa yang //
T02TD3468E:120b-13: bsgrub bya mdun du gnas shing thal mo sbyor //
T02TD3468E:120b-14: mi gzung gnyid ni yur bar yang dag bsam //
T02TD3468E:120b-15: sna bug nas ni de bzhin bung ba yis //
T02TD3468E:120b-16: de rnams bsgrub bya nyid kyi snying gar zhugs //
T02TD3468E:120b-17: snying ga'i padma kun nas bldag cing rnyings //
T02TD3468E:120b-18: de yi yid kyi sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa yis //
T02TD3468E:120b-19: nges phyung de las slar yang zhugs gyur nas //
T02TD3468E:120b-20: de la de bzhin nges par yid thim bsam //
T02TD3468E:120b-21: rnam pa de bzhin brtan pa dang ldan sems //
T02TD3468E:121a-1: ru bsgrubs par gyur pa yis //
T02TD3468E:121a-2: dbang po'ang de rnams dbang dang ldan 'gyur te //
T02TD3468E:121a-3: bcu bzhi'i nyi ma rnams kyis nges par 'grub //
T02TD3468E:121a-4: dpal ldan 'dzam dbyangs sgrub thabs gcig tu 'di //
T02TD3468E:121a-5: bla ma dam pa las rnyed bdag gsal byas //
T02TD3468E:121a-6: 'di la ci ste 'ang med par 'gyur snyam pa'i //
T02TD3468E:121a-7: 'dir ni cung zad the tshom mi bya'o //
T02TD3468E:121a-8: 'di rnams bkug nas nges par sems nyid zhi //
T02TD3468E:121a-9: dge byed ces byas ji ltar nyer bstan mdzad //
T02TD3468E:121a-10: dam pa rnams kyis bya ba yongs spangs nas //
T02TD3468E:121a-11: bdag gi bla ma dag ni 'di yis so //
T02TD3468E:121a-12: rkang drug brgyad pa dag gis mchog bris pa'i //
T02TD3468E:121a-13: gang 'dir dge ba dri med cung zad thob ;
T02TD3468E:121a-14: / de yis sems can ma lus de bzhin du //
T02TD3468E:121a-15: dpal ldan 'jam mgon lhan cig ldan par shog / slob dpon dge ba byed pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad do //
T02TD3468E:121a-16: bdag gis sgrub thabs mchog tu gyur pa 'di bris pa'i //
T02TD3468E:121a-17: dge ba ma lus gang thob shin tu rnam dag pa //
T02TD3468E:121a-18: de yis 'jig rten 'di rnams rgyal ba nyid thob nas //
T02TD3468E:121a-19: srid pa'i 'jigs pa ma lus shin tu rab zhi shog / lhag par dbang du byed pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
